website_summaries.verdict: Sony’s single DIN receiver is a solid option if you’re looking for a car stereo focused on streaming audio from your phone. It’s easy to pair with your phone, and it’s one of few models that supports voice commands.
pros: It’s got NFC technology built in, so Android users can connect just by touching their phones to the volume knobs
It’s got voice commands, so you can easily change tracks or the volume with a few phrases
It’s affordable even with these unique features
cons: It’s Android-centric, so iPhone users will miss out on a few features
It’s “satellite ready,” but you’ll still have to buy a separate satellite radio receiver to enjoy your subscription in your car

customer_reviews.title: Loved it. This one doesn't
customer_reviews.text: Blue Tooth works well. I changed out my original Sony to have Blue Tooth but lost some features. The original Sony had "loudness" control. Loved it. This one doesn't. It also had "rear bass enhance. This one doesn't . No bass response. Now today I have to go looking for a small sub-woofer to get some bass to the radio. Also the USB will only play 265 MP3 tunes. I have 285. Sony makes a good product but you need to educate yourself on them first.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality is great!  Bluetooth is sometimes spotty
customer_reviews.text: Good unit, simple interface. Doesn't come with all the bells and whistles but sound is great. Bluetooth is spotty, sometimes it will disconnect or sometimes it only lets you stream music but not make calls. The microphone is in the head unit and works well. No need to run a mic cord. Mp3 or aac songs on a USB memory stick play really good. Sound is great. Also will read the memory stick very fast. Remote takes a little bit to get used to. One feature I've never seen before on a head unit, this unit will display the cars battery voltage. Kinda cool.
customer_reviews.author: Cletus L. McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes you get more than you paid for
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these units the one I got from this bender sent a bad radio but amazon turned my money around so fast I reordered same model different vendor 10.00 cheaper love this model have had one in my van for a while and just added a 500 watt amp with a 12 inch pioneer and the head unit has more then its money’s worth of power and ways to control said power lovin it
customer_reviews.author: Todd Gould

customer_reviews.title: so far its great. Linked up my phone right after install
customer_reviews.text: so far its great. Linked up my phone right after install. Used this head unit to replace a older non bluetooth unit in a probox top on my polaris ranger.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: good unit
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a service truck to update it with Bluetooth. Worked great and sounds good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very temperamental, not user friendly. Not Sony best design.
customer_reviews.text: This receiver is great for sound quality but a pain to use. The Bluetooth is clunky and unless you have lots of patience look for another radio. This is the second radio I ordered the first didn't work properly and I just didn't want to keep going with out listening to something while driving however I still have a day to return I may do that.
customer_reviews.author: Parent

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: My grandfather's double din touch screen went out due to a short on the 12v constant. So I put in this radio and spliced into another 12v constant. The radio is very simple for him to use and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Cole Rose

customer_reviews.title: Must double press button for att to turn off when pressing any button on display
customer_reviews.text: I installed this unit and the att setting would constantly switch on and off anytime I pressed any buttons. Very annoying having to double tap buttons for the sound to come back on. I am returning the unit as sony tech support was of no assistance insisting I did something wrong during installation. I have installed many head units and have never had these issues before. Other than that one issue the unit sounded nice and the face layout is nice. I will not be buying another sony head unit.
customer_reviews.author: anthony fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Works great for everything except the phone. No separate mic, I usually switch to speaker phone to talk to people over using the radio. Other than that, it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: 916MINI

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your money
customer_reviews.text: I have used Sony stereo in my vehicles for years. Have a old truck I use for work and was in need of a radio. Being a old truck I didn’t want to spend a lot. Came across this Sony and was pleased with the sound and features. Sony has always had good quality systems. You can’t go wrong with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for the buck no CD player but who uses those. Bluetooth pairing with phone and streaming Xm ready and pretty straight forward install if your looking for a cheap good radio unit look no further
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: After a year of use still killing it man I love this thing especially that "extra bass" button man that just makes everything perform it's best. WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
customer_reviews.author: Rivers Bessinger

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This came in a timely manner, was exactly as described and actually improved the sound quality of the stock speakers in the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Somy
customer_reviews.text: does what its suppose to do, for the price its good
customer_reviews.author: Luis mario molina pena

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Installed this in my 01 Honda Civic. Took sometime to check the original wiring diagram for the car and cross check it with the supplied diagram for the stereo. After that some simple soldering and it works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stereo and a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this radio! It's exactly what I wanted and a great price! I don't know about you but I don't use CDs anymore. It has very nice Bluetooth features! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: nick zagami

customer_reviews.title: Simple, easy to install and ise
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. Great sound quality. Great product for the price
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Workman

customer_reviews.title: exactly what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: what can i say ? easy to set up and exactly what i was looking for mainly bluetooth connection
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Attard

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, horrible Android connectivity with bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: The good: decent sound, flexible EQ section, not bad looking. The bad: Bluetooth connectivity an absolute nightmare. Random disconnects, and while you could voice dial, browse call history, etc... you have maybe a 1-in-20 chance of getting the phonebook to load. On the times when it did load, every single contact had the wrong phone number associated with it. I've purchased Sony car stereos exclusively for mine and my kids older vehicles for about ten years now without a problem, but this thing was a huge disappointment. Returning it in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: -BFS

customer_reviews.title: Great head unit. Couple it with solid speakers
customer_reviews.text: Installed yesterday coupled with Kenwwod performance speakers. Sound quality is amazing with this combo. I love the extra bass option. I had the speakers hooked to a jvc head unit previously and this Sony made a huge difference. Bluetooth works great - i love not having an external microphone and the built in one is more than enough. Set up and software are extremely easy to use which is a big plus. Only downside is I haven t been able to hook my Samsung to the usb and have it read it - might have to update my phone though. Head unit comes with installing tools, remote and dashboard sleeve. I definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: good product, not user friendly, PAIN TO USE.
customer_reviews.text: Good product, poor user button design, layout. TOO MUCH TROUBLE TO KEEP MESSING WITH IT. HAVE TO READ THE MANUAL TO REMEMBER ALL OF THE USER INTERFACE NUANCES. SPEND A LITTLE MORE, GET A BETTER RADIO. SONY, YOU BLEW IT.
customer_reviews.author: forjon7

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy used
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the ”used like new" option and I got very well used....the box was all messed up. The stereo bezel and faceplate are JB welded on. I had to break off the bezel for my application and I'll just deal with the faceplate being stuck on I guess. Update: after a few months of use the bluetooth seems to have stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Zero

customer_reviews.title: Keep the settings
customer_reviews.text: The stereo does not store the time and frequency of the radio channel, All settings disappear once the car is turned on.
customer_reviews.author: AHMED ALNOAIMI

customer_reviews.title: Good but, too good.
customer_reviews.text: Good but a little more complicated than the wife wants. The BT automatically connects and it's doesn't come with a mic so for phone use it's a PITA if you get a call while blue toothed listening to music going done the road. But for music it does fine, way better than OEM radio.
customer_reviews.author: MC Tires n Service

customer_reviews.title: Ease of installation
customer_reviews.text: Already having a Sony harness, installation was, literally, plug and play. Plugged in my Echo Auto, and I have a very modern system, in my '02 Volvo V-40. Quite Pleased
customer_reviews.author: B. L. MacRitchie

customer_reviews.title: Terrible built in microphone
customer_reviews.text: The built in Bluetooth microphone is practically unusable. I can hear people fine, they cannot hear me clearly at all. Conversations are difficult and I end up switching back to holding my phone, and talking into it. Very disappointing, I will definitely have to change this unit out for a better Bluetooth setup
customer_reviews.author: Gazlyons

customer_reviews.title: Good boat stereo
customer_reviews.text: Decent radio for the boat. Hard to use the interface could be easier. Bluetooth and setti gs are hard to access, but not nad for a cheap radio.
customer_reviews.author: James R

customer_reviews.title: Brother Loves it, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Installed in Brothers car, He is a tech type and loves all the features, can not attest to longevity but easy install and hes happy.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph H.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny, no cd player but that is pretty much a dead breed anyway. audio quality is excellent and several adjustments that can be done.
customer_reviews.author: ian

customer_reviews.title: Sony quality is great
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound love nfc connection just put my phone on volume knob and ready to go
customer_reviews.author: Johnny B

customer_reviews.title: Very nice radio
customer_reviews.text: Much better then the pioneers I have been buying. Bluetooth works great.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Well worth $80
customer_reviews.text: Pretty impressed with this head unit. With a 10 band EQ its easy to get your sound dialed in. I wish it came with a bluetooth microphone but that's not a big deal considering it's only $10 more to get one. I paired this with 4 Polk speakers, a 10" kicker and a 500 watt rms mono Polk amp in my dodge ram.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bryan

product_meta.title: Sony DSXA415BT Digital Media Receiver with Bluetooth & Satellite Radio
product_meta.description: Edition:ReceiverKeep in touch on the road with Dual Bluetooth connectivity from the dsx-a415bt. Wirelessly connect your first phone to play music, get directions and communicate with contacts. Add a second phone to make hands-free calls on the move from either one
feature_bullets: Control with your voice: use voice commands to get directions, play music, and communicate with contacts when connected with your smartphone.
Tap to connect wirelessly: NFC technology lets you connect your Bluetooth phone instantly, just by tapping it on the receiver's volume knob.
Enjoy powerful sound: built-in 4x55 w amplification delivers clear audio playback and plenty of volume.
Bring Siri on the road: hook up your iOS Device to control the music in it, navigation, Messaging, and more, using Siri eyes free
Voice control for Android: use voice control to get directions, send messages, and play tracks on your Android smartphone.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars176 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
